short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track price history and search by image on Shopee
short.es,es_419: Seguimiento del historial de precios y búsqueda por imagen en Shopee
short.fil: Subaybayan ang kasaysayan ng presyo at maghanap ayon sa larawan sa Shopee
short.id: Lacak riwayat harga dan cari berdasarkan gambar di Shopee
short.ms: Jejak sejarah harga dan cari mengikut gambar di Shopee
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Rastreie o histórico de preços e pesquise por imagem no Shopee
short.th: ติดตามประวัติราคาและค้นหาด้วยภาพใน Shopee
short.vi: Theo dõi lịch sử giá và tìm kiếm bằng hình ảnh trên Shopee
short.zh_CN: AliPrice.com - 您的虾皮购物省钱助手

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shopping Assistant for Shopee is a price tracker for Shopee, the leading online platform in Southeast Asia and Taiwan.

Main features:
1. Price history: You can check the price history within 3 or 6 months of any product to identify true and false discounts.
2. Search for goods by picture, and find the same product on Shopee, AliExpress, Taobao etc. through image search
3. Price Drop Reminder: Add products to your favorites and you will be notified when the price drops.
4. Shortcuts to most visited sites.
5. Copy the link and share it with your friends
6. Taobao image downloader, export image link, image translation
7. Shein search by image and Naver search by image
8. Translate the whole page

If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us:
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact
By installing the AliPrice extension, you accept the terms of the "AliPrice Terms of Service" and allow the extension to redirect to affiliate program links, including Shopee and other programs. AliPrice Terms of Service - https://www.aliprice.com/information/index/page/term_of_use
Shopee is a trademark of Shopee.com, Inc. This extension was not created or endorsed by Shopee.
We do use Google Analytics to collect anonymous usage statistics to help improve user experience, but you can opt out at http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout

Edge/Firefox/Opera: https://www.aliprice.com?extension=shopee
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dengpai.aliprice
IOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/aliprice-shopping-assistant/id1282323896
long.es,es_419:
Shopping Assistant for Shopee es un rastreador de precios para Shopee, la plataforma en línea líder en el sudeste asiático.

Principales características:
1. Historial de precios: puede consultar el historial de precios dentro de los 3 o 6 meses de cualquier producto para identificar descuentos verdaderos y falsos.
2. Busque productos por imagen y encuentre el mismo producto en Shopee, AliExpress, Taobao, etc. mediante la búsqueda de imágenes
3. Recordatorio de caída de precio: agregue productos a sus favoritos y se le notificará cuando baje el precio.
4. Accesos directos a los sitios más visitados.
5. Copia el enlace y compártelo con tus amigos.
6. Descargador de imágenes de Taobao, enlace de exportación de imágenes, traducción de imágenes
7. Búsqueda de Shein por imagen y búsqueda de Naver por imagen
8. Traduce toda la página

Si tiene alguna pregunta o sugerencia, no dude en contactarnos:
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact

Shopee es una marca comercial de Shopee.com, Inc. Esta extensión no fue creada ni respaldada por Shopee.
Usamos Google Analytics para recopilar estadísticas de uso anónimas para ayudar a mejorar la experiencia del usuario, pero puede optar por no participar en http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout

Edge/Firefox/Opera: https://www.aliprice.com?extension=shopee
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dengpai.aliprice
IOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/aliprice-shopping-assistant/id1282323896
long.fil:
Ang Shopping Assistant para sa Shopee ay isang price tracker para sa Shopee, ang nangungunang online platform sa Southeast Asia at Taiwan.

Pangunahing tampok:
1. History ng presyo: Maaari mong suriin ang history ng presyo sa loob ng 3 o 6 na buwan ng anumang produkto upang matukoy ang tama at maling mga diskwento.
2. Maghanap ng mga kalakal sa pamamagitan ng larawan, at hanapin ang parehong produkto sa Shopee, AliExpress, Taobao atbp. sa pamamagitan ng paghahanap ng larawan
3. Paalala ng Pagbaba ng Presyo: Magdagdag ng mga produkto sa iyong mga paborito at aabisuhan ka kapag bumaba ang presyo.
4. Mga shortcut sa karamihan ng binisita na mga site.
5. Kopyahin ang link at ibahagi ito sa iyong mga kaibigan
6. Taobao image downloader, export image link, image translation
7. Shein paghahanap sa pamamagitan ng imahe at Naver paghahanap sa pamamagitan ng larawan
8. Isalin ang buong pahina

Kung mayroon kang anumang mga katanungan o mungkahi, mangyaring huwag mag-atubiling makipag-ugnay sa amin:
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact

Edge/Firefox/Opera: https://www.aliprice.com?extension=shopee
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dengpai.aliprice
IOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/aliprice-shopping-assistant/id1282323896
long.id:
Shopify Shopping Assistant adalah alat perluasan yang memfasilitasi belanja Anda di Shopee. Shopee adalah platform belanja online terkemuka di Taiwan dan Asia Tenggara, yang mendukung banyak situs.

Fitur utama:
1. Riwayat harga: Anda dapat memeriksa riwayat harga dalam 3 atau 6 bulan dari produk apa pun untuk mengidentifikasi diskon yang benar dan salah.
2. Cari barang berdasarkan gambar, dan temukan produk yang sama di Shopee, AliExpress, Taobao dll melalui pencarian gambar
3. Pengingat Penurunan Harga: Tambahkan produk ke favorit Anda dan Anda akan diberi tahu saat harga turun.
4. Pintasan ke situs yang paling sering dikunjungi.
5. Salin tautannya dan bagikan ke teman-teman Anda
6. Pengunduh gambar Taobao, ekspor tautan gambar, terjemahan gambar
7. Pencarian Shein berdasarkan gambar dan pencarian Naver berdasarkan gambar
8. Terjemahkan seluruh halaman

Jika Anda memiliki pertanyaan atau saran, jangan ragu untuk menghubungi kami:
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact

Edge/Firefox/Opera: https://www.aliprice.com?extension=shopee
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dengpai.aliprice
IOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/aliprice-shopping-assistant/id1282323896
long.ms:
Pembantu Beli-belah Shopee ialah alat pengembangan yang memudahkan anda membeli-belah di Shopee. Shopee ialah platform beli-belah dalam talian terkemuka di Taiwan dan Asia Tenggara, menyokong berbilang tapak.

Ciri-ciri utama:
1. Sejarah harga: Anda boleh menyemak sejarah harga dalam tempoh 3 atau 6 bulan dari mana-mana produk untuk mengenal pasti diskaun benar dan palsu.
2. Cari barangan mengikut gambar, dan cari produk yang sama di Shopee, AliExpress, Taobao dan lain-lain melalui carian imej
3. Peringatan Turun Harga: Tambahkan produk pada kegemaran anda dan anda akan dimaklumkan apabila harga turun.
4. Pintasan ke tapak yang paling banyak dilawati.
5. Salin pautan dan kongsi dengan rakan anda
6. Pemuat turun imej Taobao, pautan imej eksport, terjemahan imej
7. Carian Shein mengikut imej dan carian Naver mengikut imej
8. Terjemah seluruh halaman

Jika anda mempunyai sebarang pertanyaan atau cadangan, sila hubungi kami:
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact

Edge/Firefox/Opera: https://www.aliprice.com?extension=shopee
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dengpai.aliprice
IOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/aliprice-shopping-assistant/id1282323896
long.pt_BR,pt_PT:
O Assistente de Compras da Shopee é um rastreador de preços da Shopee, a principal plataforma online do Sudeste Asiático.

Principais características:
1. Histórico de preços: você pode verificar o histórico de preços de 3 ou 6 meses de qualquer produto para identificar descontos verdadeiros e falsos.
2. Pesquise produtos por imagem e encontre o mesmo produto no Shopee, AliExpress, Taobao etc.
3. Lembrete de queda de preço: adicione produtos aos seus favoritos e você será notificado quando o preço cair.
4. Atalhos para sites mais visitados.
5. Copie o link e compartilhe com seus amigos
6. Downloader de imagem Taobao, link de exportação de imagem, tradução de imagem
7. Pesquisa Shein por imagem e pesquisa Naver por imagem
8. Traduza a página inteira

Se você tiver alguma dúvida ou sugestão, sinta-se à vontade para entrar em contato conosco:
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact

Shopee é uma marca comercial da Shopee.com, Inc. Esta extensão não foi criada ou endossada pela Shopee.
Nós usamos o Google Analytics para coletar estatísticas de uso anônimas para ajudar a melhorar a experiência do usuário, mas você pode desativá-lo em http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout

Edge/Firefox/Opera: https://www.aliprice.com?extension=shopee
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dengpai.aliprice
IOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/aliprice-shopping-assistant/id1282323896
long.th:
Shopping Assistant สำหรับ Shopee เป็นตัวติดตามราคาสำหรับ Shopee ซึ่งเป็นแพลตฟอร์มออนไลน์ชั้นนำในเอเชียตะวันออกเฉียงใต้

คุณสมบัติหลัก:
1. ประวัติราคา: คุณสามารถตรวจสอบประวัติราคาภายใน 3 หรือ 6 เดือนของผลิตภัณฑ์ใดๆ เพื่อระบุส่วนลดจริงและเท็จ
2. ค้นหาสินค้าจากรูปภาพ และค้นหาสินค้าเดียวกันบน Shopee, AliExpress, Taobao ฯลฯ ผ่านการค้นหารูปภาพ
3. การแจ้งเตือนการลดราคา: เพิ่มสินค้าในรายการโปรดของคุณและคุณจะได้รับแจ้งเมื่อราคาลดลง
4. ทางลัดไปยังไซต์ที่เข้าชมบ่อยที่สุด
5. คัดลอกลิงก์และแชร์กับเพื่อนของคุณ
6. เครื่องมือดาวน์โหลดรูปภาพ Taobao, ลิงก์รูปภาพส่งออก, การแปลรูปภาพ
7. Shein ค้นหาด้วยรูปภาพและค้นหา Naver ด้วยรูปภาพ
8. แปลทั้งหน้า

หากคุณมีคำถามหรือข้อเสนอแนะ โปรดติดต่อเรา：
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact

Shopee เป็นเครื่องหมายการค้าของ Shopee.com, Inc. ส่วนขยายนี้ไม่ได้สร้างหรือรับรองโดย Shopee
เราใช้ Google Analytics เพื่อรวบรวมสถิติการใช้งานที่ไม่ระบุชื่อเพื่อช่วยปรับปรุงประสบการณ์ของผู้ใช้ แต่คุณสามารถเลือกไม่ใช้ได้ที่ http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout

Edge/Firefox/Opera: https://www.aliprice.com?extension=shopee
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dengpai.aliprice
IOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/aliprice-shopping-assistant/id1282323896
long.vi:
Trợ lý mua sắm cho Shopee là công cụ theo dõi giá cho Shopee, nền tảng trực tuyến hàng đầu ở Đông Nam Á.

Những đặc điểm chính:
1. Lịch sử giá: Bạn có thể kiểm tra lịch sử giá trong vòng 3 hoặc 6 tháng của bất kỳ sản phẩm nào để xác định mức giảm giá đúng và sai.
2. Tìm kiếm hàng hóa bằng hình ảnh và tìm sản phẩm tương tự trên AliExpress, AliExpress, Taobao, v.v. thông qua tìm kiếm hình ảnh
3. Nhắc nhở giảm giá: Thêm sản phẩm vào danh sách yêu thích của bạn và bạn sẽ được thông báo khi giá giảm.
4. Phím tắt đến các trang web được truy cập nhiều nhất.
5. Sao chép liên kết và chia sẻ với bạn bè
6. Trình tải ảnh taobao, xuất link ảnh, dịch ảnh
7. Shein tìm kiếm bằng hình ảnh và tìm kiếm Naver bằng hình ảnh
8. Dịch toàn bộ trang

Nếu bạn có bất kỳ câu hỏi hoặc đề xuất nào, xin vui lòng liên hệ với chúng tôi:
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact

Shopee là thương hiệu của Shopee.com, Inc. Phần mở rộng này không được Shopee tạo ra hoặc xác nhận.
Chúng tôi sử dụng Google Analytics để thu thập số liệu thống kê sử dụng ẩn danh nhằm giúp cải thiện trải nghiệm người dùng, nhưng bạn có thể chọn không tham gia tại http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout

Edge/Firefox/Opera: https://www.aliprice.com?extension=shopee
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dengpai.aliprice
IOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/aliprice-shopping-assistant/id1282323896
long.zh_CN:
虾皮购物助手是一个方便您在虾皮上购物的拓展工具。虾皮购物是台湾和东南亚领先的在线购物平台，支持多个站点。

到目前为止，我们的工具有4个主要功能。
1. 价格历史记录：您可以在查看任何产品的价格历史动态，认清真假折扣。
2. 以图搜货，通过图片搜索，找到虾皮、速卖通、阿里巴巴、1688、淘宝、Shopee、京东、拼多多上的同款产品，堪称找货神器。
3. 降价提醒：将产品添加到您的收藏夹中，当价格下降时您会收到通知。
4. 快捷入口。
5. 复制链接分享给你的朋友
6. 淘宝、1688、阿里巴巴、速卖通、拼多多图片下载，导出图片链接，图片翻译
7. Shein 图片搜索和 Naver 以图搜同款
8. 翻译网页，无需VPN

如果您有任何问题或建议，请随时联系我们：
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact

Edge/Firefox/Opera: https://www.aliprice.com?extension=shopee
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dengpai.aliprice
IOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/aliprice-shopping-assistant/id1282323896
long.zh_TW:
蝦皮購物助手是一個方便您在蝦皮上購物的拓展工具。 蝦皮購物是台灣和東南亞領先的線上購物平台，支援多個站點。

到目前為止，我們的工具有4個主要功能。
1. 價格歷史記錄：您可以在查看任何產品的價格歷史動態，認清真假折扣。
2. 以圖搜貨，透過圖片搜索，找到蝦皮、速賣通、阿里巴巴、1688、淘寶、Shopee、京東、拼多多上的同款產品，堪稱找貨神器。
3. 降價提醒：將產品添加到您的收藏夾中，當價格下降時您會收到通知。
4. 快捷入口。
5. 複製連結分享給你的朋友
6. 淘寶、1688、阿里巴巴、速賣通、拼多多圖片下載，導出圖片鏈接，圖片翻譯
7. 淘寶和1688代購和一件代發
8. Shein 圖片搜尋和 Naver 以圖搜同款
9. 匯出淘寶、1688的購物車列表

如果您有任何問題或建議，請隨時與我們聯繫：
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact

Edge/Firefox/Opera: https://www.aliprice.com?extension=shopee
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dengpai.aliprice
IOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/aliprice-shopping-assistant/id1282323896
